mapper.select: SELECT * FROM User WHERE phone = #{phone} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO User(id, user_name, phone, password, face_url) VALUES (0,#{user_name},#{phone},#{password},#{face_url})
INSERT INTO Message(id, user_id, user_name, face_url, content, total_likes, send_timestamp) VALUES (0, #{user_id}, #{user_name}, #{face_url}, #{content}, #{total_likes}, #{send_timestamp})
mapper.update: UPDATE Message SET total_likes = total_likes+1 WHERE id=#{message_id}
